verbose_text: Our findings that AAV9-STAS and p38 MAPK inhibition reduces phosphorylation of p53 S18 and rescues survival of SMA motor neurons in vivo, together with the observation that Stasimon deficiency is sufficient to induce p38 MAPK mediated p53 S18 phosphorylation in vitro, fill this knowledge gap, placing Stasimon dysfunction upstream of a p38 MAPK / p53 dependent neurodegenerative axis (XREF_FIG).
